tasks.description: Extract schema-bound structured values from free-text intake content into Phase 1 schema fields without expanding the schema. Output only fields explicitly allowed for AI extraction.
tasks.confidence_model: Per-field confidence. HIGH only when explicit, direct, supported by evidence; otherwise MED/LOW. Null outputs require INSUFFICIENT_EVIDENCE.
tasks.evidence_strategy: Evidence pointers required for every non-null extraction. If no direct evidence, output null and reason code.
tasks.failure_mode: Return empty extractions array; log run as PARTIAL/FAIL depending on pipeline. Never block downstream review.

tasks.description: Synthesize a coherent 1-page case narrative from structured fields and messages, focusing on Parties, Conflict, and Goals.
tasks.confidence_model: Summarization only; inherent confidence. Must be grounded in input text.
tasks.evidence_strategy: No strict evidence pointers required for summary text, but must not hallucinate facts.
tasks.failure_mode: Return empty narrative object; log failure.

tasks.description: Detect domestic violence (DV) indicators in intake content. Produce advisory flags only with evidence and non-conclusory phrasing. No legal advice.
tasks.confidence_model: HIGH only if clear mention of physical harm/threats/coercive control with direct evidence; otherwise MED/LOW. If ambiguous, flag_present may be true with LOW confidence and explicit ambiguity note.
tasks.evidence_strategy: At least one supporting evidence pointer required when flag_present=true.
tasks.failure_mode: Return flag_present=false with confidence LOW and a system note 'TASK_FAILED' only if model call fails; do not invent evidence.

tasks.description: Detect jurisdictional complexity signals (multi-state residence, relocation, military) and cite relevant Georgia statutes (e.g., UCCJEA, OCGA 19-9-61).
tasks.confidence_model: Signals only. Confidence based on explicitness and number of corroborating sources; never claims eligibility or proper venue.
tasks.evidence_strategy: Evidence required for flag_present=true. Prefer structured answers first, then narrative.
tasks.failure_mode: Return flag_present=false with LOW confidence if task cannot run; log task failure.

tasks.description: Detect custody conflict signals and cite relevant Georgia statutes (e.g., OCGA 19-9-3 for Best Interests, relocation notice requirements).
tasks.confidence_model: Confidence increases with explicit dispute language and corroboration across answers.
tasks.evidence_strategy: Evidence required when true; cite specific statements.
tasks.failure_mode: Fail-safe to false/LOW if task fails; never block review.

tasks.description: Detect contradictions or inconsistencies across structured fields and free-text (dates, residency, marriage facts, children count, county mentions) and output inconsistency findings with evidence.
tasks.confidence_model: HIGH when explicit contradiction between two sources; MED when ambiguous; LOW when inference needed (should be avoided).
tasks.evidence_strategy: Provide at least two evidence pointers showing conflict when severity is MED/HIGH.
tasks.failure_mode: Return empty list if task fails; log failure.

tasks.description: Extract county mentions from free-text and suggest normalization against ga_counties.csv. Must defer to WF3 canonical county if present and must not overwrite anything.
tasks.confidence_model: HIGH for exact matches; MED for strong fuzzy match; LOW if ambiguous or multiple matches.
tasks.evidence_strategy: Evidence pointer required for each mention; do not suggest without a source mention.
tasks.failure_mode: Return empty mentions; do not block any flow.

tasks.description: Produce a short reviewer-facing checklist summary of the most important AI-detected items (extractions with MED/LOW confidence, flags present, and key inconsistencies). No advice, no conclusions, cite evidence pointers (references only).
tasks.confidence_model: Not applicable; summary only. Uses upstream confidences for prioritization.
tasks.evidence_strategy: No new evidence; references must point to existing evidence IDs from prior WF4 tasks.
